string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.

slidelink.displaytext: What do you think went wrong in this scenario?

Situation You have asked to schedule a meeting with your team regarding some feedback from the client. What are the elements that need to be included in the email to send out as an clear and complete message?
Select an option and click submit.

Situation: You are based at Acme Plaza and today you visit SUN House for a meeting. You meet a senior stakeholder in the elevator and he/she asks you for some quick updates on a subject. How would you respond?
Select an option and click submit.
Q1. ‘Calmness’ is one of the 7 Cs of Communication.
Q2. What is the goal of effective communication?

Q 3. Situation: During a kickoff session of a newly acquired project, one of your subordinates presents an out of the box idea which is good; but can not be used due to budget constraints.
How would you react?
Q4. Which one of the following is a barrier to successful communication?
Q 5. Situation: You have been asked to attend an meeting with the stakeholders about an on-going project. What all points should you keep in mind while attending the meeting?
